item.title: XPN Local - 07.26.2022
item.description: New music by Sun Ra Arkestra, Alex G, and Palm, studio sessions from The Lunar Year and Kristine Leschper, a preview of Sweet Juice Summer Fest and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, July 26th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 08.02.2022
item.description: New music by Ruby The Hatchet, Harrowgrove, and Friendship, a Key Studio Session from Mobbluz, previews of Tellus3City Fest and Good Things Are Happening Fest, and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, August 2nd, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 08.09.2022
item.description: A conversation with Philly radio legend Dyana Williams and Abdur Rahman, a Key Studio Session from Balmour and his incredible band, plus new music from Shannen Moser, The Bigness, Kate Dressed Up and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, August 9th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 08.16.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Moses Mosima, plus new music from Catbite, Velvet Rouge, Black Thought, Ghösh, Vixen77 and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, August 16th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 08.23.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Ghösh and a playback of Nina Ryser's Indie Rock Hit Parade session, plus new music from Meet The Bug, Doll Spirit Vessell and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, August 23rd, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 08.30.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Best Bear, a guest DJ set by Rachel Andie, new music by Jacqueline Constance, Petrol and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, August 30th, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 09.06.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from Friendship, a conversation with Abdur Rahman and Sinnia Brown, new music by Boon, Imani, Christina Ward and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, September 6, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 09.13.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from The Tisburys, a Philly-centric preview of XPNFest, new music by Alex G, Harrowgrove, Laura Lizcano and more on the WXPN Local show from Tuesday, September 13, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 09.20.2022
item.description: New music from Shannen Moser, Flatwaves, Ruby The Hatchet, and more on WXPN Local from September 20, 2022.

item.title: XPN Local - 09.27.2022
item.description: A Key Studio Session from The Ire, previews of Champagne Jam 2022 and You Too Fest, new music from Ruby The Hatchet, Zeek Burse, Brothers, and more on WXPN Local from September 27, 2022.
